documentation.text: @dev interface of the ERC735 (Claim Holder) standard as defined in the EIP.

@dev Emitted when a claim request was performed.
 Specification: Is not clear

@dev Emitted when a claim was added.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when a claim was successfully added.

@dev Emitted when a claim was removed.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when removeClaim was successfully called.

@dev Emitted when a claim was changed.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when changeClaim was successfully called.

@dev Get a claim by its ID.
 Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address, uint256 topic))`.
@dev Returns an array of claim IDs by topic.

@dev Add or update a claim.
 Triggers Event: `ClaimRequested`, `ClaimAdded`, `ClaimChanged`
 Specification: Requests the ADDITION or the CHANGE of a claim from an issuer.
 Claims can requested to be added by anybody, including the claim holder itself (self issued).
 _signature is a signed message of the following structure: `keccak256(abi.encode(address identityHolder_address, uint256 topic, bytes data))`.
 Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address + uint256 topic))`.
 This COULD implement an approval process for pending claims, or add them right away.
 MUST return a claimRequestId (use claim ID) that COULD be sent to the approve function.
@dev interface of the ERC735 (Claim Holder) standard as defined in the EIP.

@dev Emitted when a claim request was performed.
 Specification: Is not clear

@dev Emitted when a claim was added.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when a claim was successfully added.

@dev Emitted when a claim was removed.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when removeClaim was successfully called.

@dev Emitted when a claim was changed.
 Specification: MUST be triggered when changeClaim was successfully called.

@dev Get a claim by its ID.
 Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address, uint256 topic))`.
@dev Returns an array of claim IDs by topic.

@dev Add or update a claim.
 Triggers Event: `ClaimRequested`, `ClaimAdded`, `ClaimChanged`
 Specification: Requests the ADDITION or the CHANGE of a claim from an issuer.
 Claims can requested to be added by anybody, including the claim holder itself (self issued).
 _signature is a signed message of the following structure: `keccak256(abi.encode(address identityHolder_address, uint256 topic, bytes data))`.
 Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address + uint256 topic))`.
 This COULD implement an approval process for pending claims, or add them right away.
 MUST return a claimRequestId (use claim ID) that COULD be sent to the approve function.

devdoc.details: interface of the ERC735 (Claim Holder) standard as defined in the EIP.

ClaimAdded(bytes32,uint256,uint256,addre.details: Emitted when a claim was added. Specification: MUST be triggered when a claim was successfully added.

ClaimChanged(bytes32,uint256,uint256,add.details: Emitted when a claim was changed. Specification: MUST be triggered when changeClaim was successfully called.

ClaimRemoved(bytes32,uint256,uint256,add.details: Emitted when a claim was removed. Specification: MUST be triggered when removeClaim was successfully called.

ClaimRequested(uint256,uint256,uint256,a.details: Emitted when a claim request was performed. Specification: Is not clear

addClaim(uint256,uint256,address,bytes,b.details: Add or update a claim. Triggers Event: `ClaimRequested`, `ClaimAdded`, `ClaimChanged` Specification: Requests the ADDITION or the CHANGE of a claim from an issuer. Claims can requested to be added by anybody, including the claim holder itself (self issued). _signature is a signed message of the following structure: `keccak256(abi.encode(address identityHolder_address, uint256 topic, bytes data))`. Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address + uint256 topic))`. This COULD implement an approval process for pending claims, or add them right away. MUST return a claimRequestId (use claim ID) that COULD be sent to the approve function.

getClaim(bytes32).details: Get a claim by its ID. Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address, uint256 topic))`.

getClaimIdsByTopic(uint256).details: Returns an array of claim IDs by topic.

removeClaim(bytes32).details: Removes a claim. Triggers Event: `ClaimRemoved` Claim IDs are generated using `keccak256(abi.encode(address issuer_address, uint256 topic))`.
